sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng àn zhège ànniǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez appuyer sur ce bouton.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please press this button.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn kùn, xiǎng shuìjiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis fatigué, je veux dormir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm sleepy, I want to sleep.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这篇文章的标题是什么？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè piān wénzhāng de biāotí shì shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le titre de cet article ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the title of this article?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天的节目是关于环保的专题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān de jiémù shì guānyú huánbǎo de zhuāntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le programme d'aujourd'hui est un dossier spécial sur l'environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today's program is a special feature on environmental protection.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ rènde tā, tā shì wǒ tóngxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je le reconnais, c'est mon camarade de classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I recognize him, he is my classmate.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīzhí wǎng qián zǒu jiù dào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Continue tout droit et tu y arriveras.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Just keep going straight and you'll be there.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì chún jīn de xiàngliàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un collier en or pur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a pure gold necklace.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng dǎyìn cǎisè de zhàopiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux imprimer des photos en couleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to print color photos.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gēnběn bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il n'est absolument pas au courant de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He doesn't know about this at all.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tuánjié jiùshì lìliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'union fait la force.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Unity is strength.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǐlùn yào hé shíjiàn jiéhé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La théorie doit être combinée avec la pratique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Theory should be combined with practice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào quèbǎo ānquán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons assurer la sécurité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must ensure safety.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de biǎoxiàn fēicháng tūchū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa performance est exceptionnelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His performance is outstanding.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 经过练习，他更加进步了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngguò liànxí, tā gèngjiā jìnbù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après la pratique, il a encore plus progressé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After practice, he improved even more.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì Zhōngwén xì de xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est étudiant au département de chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a student in the Chinese department.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiūtiān shì shōuhuò de jìjié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'automne est la saison des récoltes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Autumn is the harvest season.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 不光是我，大家都这么想。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùguāng shì wǒ, dàjiā dōu zhème xiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est pas seulement moi, tout le monde pense ainsi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's not just me, everyone thinks so.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dāngdì rén dōu hěn rèqíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les habitants locaux sont tous très chaleureux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The local people are all very warm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yī jiā gōngchǎng gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille dans une usine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works in a factory.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiǎnzhí tài hǎo le!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est tout simplement génial !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is simply too good!
